comment: Frau Constantin is such a caring teacher. She made sure that every student was engaged during lecture but never put too much pressure on anyone. All of the homework is done on der die das and there are a lot of speaking assignments.

She is a great german teacher, so nice! There really isn't a lot of work in my opinion. We only have 3 test which are easier than our homework and a speaking final where we're in groups and talk about random things. Textbook isn't required since we us a website called der,die,das and attendance isn't mandatory. I would 100% take her again!

Great woman and a great professor; she tries to make her class as engaging as possible. She gets a little passive-aggressive at times, but other than that, she's perfect. The workload for the German program is exhausting, but this is not Frau Constantin's fault.

She always tried to make her class feel like a welcoming environment, so even if you didnt know the material, you didnt feel discouraged from participating in the class discussions. Most of the stuff we do in class is just reviewing everything thats in the online textbook you have to do for homework so as long as you pay attention youll pass
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: Uses free online textbook, will take later hw, generally a good time, just be respectful and participate in class

I love love love Frau Constantin. She is so nice and kind and very helpful. You don't feel like you are being degraded because your German isn't 100% perfect. Even if you are struggling badly she is always on helping mode.

I LOVE FRAU CONSTANTIN!!! She is so sweet and an amazing teacher. She is completely understanding and she does not give up on her students, but she does push them to speak aloud and to try. She is a good grader and gives personal feedback. There is a decent amount of homework but it comes in handy. Tests are easy if you pay attention and try.

Frau Constantin is the nicest woman you could have teach you german. If you put in any degree of effort you will get an A. Having said that, if you plan to take german for more than one semester, you will have to put in work on your own to learn.

Frau Constantin is the sweetest woman ever and cares about her students so much. She only wants the best for you and will do anything to help you out. She does expect you to participate in class, but the classes are small and you become friends with everyone. It was such a fun class and she's great for people just learning german.

Professor Constantin is a very easy grader. Class participation is mandatory, which makes sense because it's a foreign language class. She likes music. Gives extra credit on tests. Assigns lots of hw.
She really wants her students to do well and grades each test with a huge curve. Study the vocab and finish the homework before the deadline and it is really easy to get an A.

Frau Constantin is the sweetest person I have ever met in my life. She is a very nice woman, and cares a lot about her students. She grades very easily and will give you points just for putting in effort. It is almost impossible to make a C on her tests, she also hardly gives homework.

Frau Constantin is an amazing teacher. She is very understanding when it comes to grading, so it's very easy to pass her class. She also has given me the encouragement to continue studying German. Highly suggest her class.

Frau Constantin is a wonderful professor. She was always more than willing to help any student who needed it. She also makes sure everyone is on the same page and understands what is going on. As long as you participate you'll do fine.

Frau Constantin is an awesome professor to take when first learning German. Does expect you to participate, but she makes it fun and enjoyable. Work for this class wasn't hard at all; homework is collected & graded at the end of tests (4 of them). Final was a dialogue. She takes you step by step and as a long as you study, you will do fine.
